house_key.name: House Key
house_key.description: A simple but well-maintained iron key. Opens the door to a modest house.

water_bucket.name: Water Bucket
water_bucket.description: A wooden bucket reinforced with iron bands. Contains fresh water from the well.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: A red and juicy apple. Looks fresh.

woodcutting_axe.name: Woodcutting Axe
woodcutting_axe.description: A heavy axe with a handle worn down by years of use. The blade is well sharpened.

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: A sturdy hemp rope. Useful for many things.

guard_badge.name: Guard Badge
guard_badge.description: A bronze badge that identifies its bearer as a member of the city guard.

handcuffs.name: Handcuffs
handcuffs.description: Pair of iron handcuffs with a key. Used to detain criminals.

ledger.name: Ledger
ledger.description: A small book with records of business transactions.

coin_pouch.name: Coin Pouch
coin_pouch.description: A small leather pouch for storing coins. It's currently empty.

bread.name: Bread
bread.description: A loaf of fresh bread. Still warm.

waterskin.name: Waterskin
waterskin.description: A leather waterskin for carrying water. It's full.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A simple but sharp dagger. Useful for self-defense.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden torch with a cloth tip soaked in tar.

ration.name: Travel Ration
ration.description: Dried food preserved for long journeys.
